sentence: Hullihan has the backing of U.S. Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona, a member of the Freedom Caucus.
author: Patrick Svitek
title: National GOP proxy war breaks out in crowded primary to succeed retiring Texas Republican

sentence: Nine other candidates are in the race, but the only one with significant resources is another veteran, Jonathan Hullihan, who touts the backing of far-right Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ).
author: Sam Brodey
title: The Drama in This Crazy Texas Primary Explains Trumpâ€™s GOP

sentence: Jonathan Hullihan said he was "blessed and honored" to have received the endorsement of Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona, a top Trump supporter who the US House in November censured for tweeting an edited anime video depicting him killing Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez of New York with a sword.
author: Camila DeChalus
title: Less Trump, more winning: Why the results of one Republican primary in Texas could give hope to new conservative candidates who don't endlessly venerate the former president
